quest

[kwZst; kwєst]

可数名词
(文语)探求,追求[for]
the ~ for truth

in quest of
? 寻求…

~ (about) for buried treasure

The hounds ~ed (about) for the fox.
那些猎犬在追寻狐狸的踪迹
